tool_description: Motivational API that provides a fresh dose of inspiration with a new quote every day. With this API, you can easily integrate inspirational quotes into your applications, websites, or platforms, offering daily encouragement, motivation, and positive messages to uplift and inspire your users.
name: Inspirational Quote of the Day
title: Inspirational Quote of the Day

api_list.name: Get Quote
api_list.description: Get the quote of the day
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://inspirational-quote-of-the-day1.p.rapidapi.com/getquote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "inspirational-quote-of-the-day1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://inspirational-quote-of-the-day1.p.rapidapi.com/getquote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "inspirational-quote-of-the-day1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
